articles.author: Ashley Gallagher, Associate Editor
articles.title: COVID-19 Vaccination Reduces Serious Disease, But Lymphoma Patients Continue to Be Vulnerable - Pharmacy Times
articles.description: Patients with lymphoma can be immunocompromised due to their disease, anti-cancer therapy, and concomitant immunosuppressive treatments, which make them more vulnerable to developing a COVID-19 infection.
